channel.title: Dead Rising 2
channel.description:
Buy this game. Seriously. The PC version is almost perfect. Really tight mouse and keyboard controls, and the engine is really optimized. Runs really well maxed out and with tons of zombies on-screen.
The PC version is also cheaper and has better graphics.
I really, really recommend this game.

item.title: Dead Rising 2
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Katana:

Jeez guys, you can’t change someone’s opinion, especially if they have in fact tried the game. I understand there are plenty of things not to like about the game; I will say that it gets more fun as you level up, though I realize that’s not the best consolation.

Also: Had an awesome moment where I got into the trainchase through the underground tunnels, and since the given music was boring, I opened the Steam web browser and started playing this:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LjadGHlsNl4
Maybe it was just coincidence, but the music lasted exactly as long as it took me to reach the engine.

It be nice if he gave a valid reason though.

Wait, who am I kidding this is the internet.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Rising 2
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
GuitarJim:

I’ve got it on Xbox 360 and find it’s great fun. It’s not supposed to be taken too seriously. There are some frame rate issues on the console when there are a lot of zombies on screen but the original did too.

How do people feel about posting weapons combos?

The ‘demo’ case zero cost 400ms points - about £3.50. Case west is another piece of dlc arriving soon and will probably cost the same. Both are exclusive to 360.

It’s so much better on PC.

Read full topic

Hubicorn has spoken.

@dblkion - You have a very jaded view and opinion of what a console fag definition is, i own a console and i like console games, some games just feel more right on console, but id never sway my decision and start being a TWAT about it, hence you, by the way get a face, and your not going down the right road to earn respect if you didn’t already know, until youve earnt respect the next forum member after the others are going to treat you like shit.

You just as bad as the halo franchise kid’s believing it to be the god of all things.

Hubicorn loves this one, period.

item.title: Dead Rising 2
item.dc:creator: bobbo
item.description:
@ dblkion… Ehh… most of the ppl who play this game have played the first one… you wouldn’t be bitching so much about had you played the first one too. Previews of the game said it was going to be just like the first one. I on the other hand think this game is great, and this is no mediocre game.

item.title: Dead Rising 2
item.dc:creator: dblkion
item.description:
I actually use it as demo, if devs are too lazy to give us propers demos why not try the game without paying it before you waste your money ?
I pay for games I believe good, and for those that I have doubts, I try them before, I don’t think this is being a pirate

To get back on the subject :
This is a really awfull game ! But there are always apple-like fan boys proud of wasting their money and trying to make people think the product is worth it :retard:

This game is worth a 8/20 for a 2010 pc game, Probably a 14/20 for console fags tho, they love meaningless game.
And shit magazines of pc games reviews or websites give even more, around 16/20 because if they don’t give those games good reviews the game editor will never let them have their hand on other games.
I remember reading a PC GAMER who gave 18/20 for The Matrix : Path Of Neo, I bought it and played it, and holy crap it was one of the worst games I had ever played…

But in the end, if you REALLY think this game is good, that means you are very tolerent to game mediocrity. I’m not

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Rising 2
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
I normally would have waited till later to buy this, but I figure then it would be difficult to find a co-op friend. It’s pretty fun, and there are actually a LOT more combo weapons than I anticipated.
There ARE some disadvantages to the PC version: You CANNOT map controls (officially. There is a gamedata edit you can make to change controls, but it doesn’t affect what it tells you to do visually), some people have had trouble running the game (not me), and it uses GFWL (I don’t mind; but it does make networking easier for them)

Read full topic
